channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: YouTubeは、政府が「栄光あれ香港」抗議歌の禁止を求めた後、32の動画リンクをブロックする香港の裁判所命令に従うと発表した（Jeffrey Dastin/Reuters）
item.description:
Jeffrey Dastin / Reuters:
YouTube says it will comply with a Hong Kong court order to block 32 video links, after the government sought to ban the Glory to Hong Kong protest anthem  —  Alphabet's (GOOGL.O) YouTube on Tuesday said it will comply with a Hong Kong court decision and block access to 32 video links deemed to be prohibited content.

item.title: NPRのデイヴィッド・フォルケンフリックとFloodlightのミランダ・グリーンによる、地元紙リッチモンド・スタンダードがいかにしてシェブロンの口車に乗せられたかを暴くQ&A（Neel Dhanesha/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Neel Dhanesha / Nieman Lab:
Q&A with NPR's David Folkenflik and Floodlight's Miranda Green on uncovering how The Richmond Standard, a local newspaper, was set up as Chevron's mouthpiece  —  “It's information.  But it's not news.”  —  In March, NPR's David Folkenflik and Miranda Green of Floodlight co-published …

item.title: Reddit、Q&A機能「Ask Me Anything」の新ツールを発表、AMA専用タブ、最大5人のゲストホスト対応、プロモーションオプションなど（Lauren Forristal/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Lauren Forristal / TechCrunch:
Reddit launches new tools for its Ask Me Anything Q&A feature, including a dedicated AMA tab, support for up to five guest hosts, and promotional options  —  Reddit announced on Tuesday the launch of five new tools for AMA (Ask Me Anything), its Q&A feature where celebrities, public figures …

item.title: Redditの株価は、r/WallStreetBetsへの投稿も追い風となったミーム株上昇の中、本日7.13%上昇し、GameStopは60.10%、AMCは31.98%上昇した（Ashley Capoot/CNBC）
item.description:
Ashley Capoot / CNBC:
Reddit's stock closed up 7.13% today, amid a meme stocks rally driven in part by posts on r/WallStreetBets; GameStop closed up 60.10% and AMC up 31.98%  —  Reddit shares popped 7% on Tuesday, climbing for a second straight day after retail traders kicked off a buying frenzy of so-called meme stocks.

item.title: ニールセン、テレビ視聴の企業別ランキング「The Media Distributor Gauge」を発表：4月のテレビ視聴に占めるディズニーの割合は11.5％、YouTubeは9.6％（Kayla Cobb/The Wrap）
item.description:
Kayla Cobb / The Wrap:
Nielsen launches The Media Distributor Gauge, showing TV usage ranked by company: Disney accounted for 11.5% of TV viewing in April, YouTube accounted for 9.6%  —  Nielsen has launched a new tool to better monitor the ongoing streaming wars.  Say hello to the Media Distributor Gauge …

item.title: TelevisaUnivisionによると、VixのMAUは現在5,000万人、前年比70％増で、以前から発表されていたVixの広告付き層を5月15日に開始する予定（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
TelevisaUnivision says Vix now has 50M MAUs, up 70% YoY, and plans to launch the previously announced ad-supported tier of Vix on May 15  —  TelevisaUnivision said flagship streaming service Vix now has 50 million monthly active users, up 70% over this time last year.

item.title: グーグル、電子透かしシステム「SynthID」をAIが生成した動画やテキストに拡大、AIが生成した画像や音声の検出も可能に（Umar Shakir/The Verge）
item.description:
Umar Shakir / The Verge:
Google expands its SynthID watermark imprinting system to AI-generated video and text; the tool can already attempt to detect AI-generated images and audio  —  Among Google's swath of new AI models and tools announced today, the company is also expanding its AI content watermarking …

item.title: グーグルは、今週から米国の全ユーザーに、そしてまもなくさらに多くの国で、検索におけるAIオーバービューを展開する。
item.description:
Barry Schwartz / Search Engine Land:
Google will roll out AI overviews in search to all US users, starting this week, and in more countries soon; they will be available to 1B+ users by end of year  —  AI Overviews is rolling out to all US based searchers in Google Search, making AI Overviews available to hundreds of millions …

item.title: 情報筋：一部の保守派工作員が、パンチボールやポリティコに匹敵することを目指す保守寄りの出版社ワシントン・レポーターを立ち上げるために100万ドル以上を調達した（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Sources: some conservative operatives have raised $1M+ to launch Washington Reporter, a conservative-leaning outlet aiming to rival Punchbowl and Politico  —  - “Their goal is to be the conservative-leaning Punchbowl,” said one source who has direct knowledge of the new venture.

item.title: Complexがアリア・ヒューズを編集長に、ノア・キャラハン＝ビヴァーを最高コンテンツ責任者に任命、キャラハン＝ビヴァーのメディア会社Idea Generationを買収（Marisa Guthrie/WWD）
item.description:
Marisa Guthrie / WWD:
Complex names Aria Hughes as editor-in-chief and Noah Callahan-Bever as chief content officer and buys Callahan-Bever's media company, Idea Generation  —  Noah Callahan-Bever will return to the platform as chief of content.  —  Aria Hughes has been named editor in chief of Complex …

item.title: ソニー・ピクチャーズ・テレビジョンが、Amazonプライム・ビデオで独占配信されるジョパディのスピンオフ番組「Pop Culture Jeopardy」を発表。
item.description:
Julia Jacobs / New York Times:
Sony Pictures Television announces Pop Culture Jeopardy, a Jeopardy spinoff that will stream exclusively on Amazon Prime Video; the host is yet to be announced  —  Sony Pictures Television said that “Pop Culture Jeopardy!”  — which will pit teams of three against one another — would be streamed on Prime Video.

item.title: CNNのワシントン支局長を長年務めたサム・ファイスト上級副社長が、6月末で同局を退社し、C-SPANのCEOに就任する（Hadas Gold/CNN）
item.description:
Hadas Gold / CNN:
Sam Feist, CNN's longtime Washington bureau chief and senior vice president, will leave the network at the end of June to become C-SPAN CEO  —  Sam Feist, CNN's longtime Washington bureau chief and senior vice president, is departing the network to lead the nonprofit public affairs channel C-SPAN, the networks announced Tuesday.

item.title: イランの映画監督モハンマド・ラスーロフは、イランの裁判所から映画に対して懲役8年の判決を言い渡され、国外からヨーロッパに逃亡したと語った（Emma Bubola/New York Times）。
item.description:
Emma Bubola / New York Times:
Iranian film director Mohammad Rasoulof says he has fled the country to Europe, after an Iranian court sentenced him to eight years in prison for his movies  —  Mohammad Rasoulof, known for the award-winning “There Is No Evil,” had been barred from leaving Iran after his work criticized Iran's authoritarian rule.

item.title: コムキャストのブライアン・ロバーツCEOは、ピーコック、Netflix、Apple TV+をバンドルしたStreamSaverを今月末に「大幅に値下げ」して発売する予定だと語っている（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Comcast CEO Brian Roberts says Comcast plans to launch StreamSaver, a bundle of Peacock, Netflix, and Apple TV+, later this month at a “vastly reduced price”  —  Get ready for the next cable-like streaming bundle: Comcast later this month will launch a three-way bundle …

item.title: テンセント、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比6％増の221億ドル、オンライン広告収入は前年同期比26％増の36億6000万ドル（広告インフラのアップグレードとWeChatビデオアカウントが牽引）（Josh Ye/Reuters
item.description:
Josh Ye / Reuters:
Tencent reports Q1 revenue up 6% YoY to ~$22.1B and online ad revenue up 26% YoY to ~$3.66B driven by upgraded ad infrastructure and WeChat Video Accounts  —  China's Tencent Holdings (0700.HK) posted a 6% rise in first-quarter revenue on Tuesday, beating analyst expectations …
